title: My Boy! 1.5.24 GBA Emulator
description:
My Boy! is a super fast emulator to run GameBoy Advance games on the broadest range of Android devices, from very low-end phones to modern tablets. It does more than just emulating the full system. Thanks to the save state system, you can save progress at any time and return back to it instantly. And while enabling fast-forward in game, you can quickly skip the long boring intros/dialogs in RPGs.
*** To play GB/GBC games, you need to get 'My OldBoy!'.
*** You CAN link up two different games, and it is easy! Refer to instructions on our website.
*** CHEATS ACTUALLY WORK! Please refer to the FAQ on our website.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fastest emulation. Easily get to 60 FPS without frame skips on medium-end devices.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Excellent game compatibility. Run nearly all games without a problem.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Saves your battery as much as possible.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Link cable emulation either on the same device, or across devices over Bluetooth or Wi-Fi, running at decent speed.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Gyroscope/tilt/solar sensor and rumble emulation through your Android's hardware sensors and vibrator!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Enter multilined GameShark/ActionReplay/CodeBreaker cheat codes and enable/disable them on the fly while the game is running.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ High-level BIOS emulation. No BIOS file needed.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ IPS/UPS ROM patching
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ OpenGL rendering backend, as well as normal rendering on devices without a GPU.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fast-forward to skip long stories, as well as slow down games to get past a level you cannot in normal speed.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Save games at any time with screenshot
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ On-screen keypad (multi-touch requires Android 2.0 or later), as well as shortcut buttons such as load/save. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A very powerful screen layout editor, with which you can define the position and size for each of the on-screen controls, as well as for the game video.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ External controllers support, through either the Android native way or input method.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Well-designed user interface. Seamlessly integrated with the latest Android.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create and switch to different screen-layout and key-mapping profiles.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create shortcuts to easily launch your favorite games from your desktop.
No games are included in this app and you need to obtain yours in a legal way. Place them onto your SD card, and browse to them from within the app.
